title: UX Design Co-op
description: At Dawn Foods, a food supply company, I worked as a UX Designer Co-op, enhancing the website's user experience by developing a user-friendly payment portal, advanced filter features, and intuitive navigation.

title: Front-End Developer and UX Designer
description: Collaborated with an ENT oncology research team as a front-end developer to create a website featuring a user interface and recommender system that analyzed patient-specific information for optimal treatment recommendations, enhancing personalized care.

title: Software Engineer
description: Engineered a CAD to G-Code converter in C++ for Tubender, streamlining 3D design translations for a CNC tube-bending machine. Developed a user-centric interface and website with TypeScript and React, enhancing client engagement.

title: Operations Associate
company: The Venture Mentoring Network at Northeastern
description: Facilitated mentor pairings for 100+ mentors and Northeastern Alumni ventures to enhance startup growth. Marketed VMN and onboarded 9 new startups from Northeastern campuses at conferences.
